page.title: 15BALNAHARD FARM,FINZEAN.
page.content: Balnahard is at the NW corner of Finzean,facing South with 74 acres of arable land,217 acres rough grazing and 13 acres reseeded.It grazes{32 {breeding cows with calves and one bull year-old calves being sold at Aboyne {mart.110 Blackfaced breeding ewes with {Cross Suffolk and Cross Leicester {lambs,25 Cross Suffolk and Cheviot {ewes as well as 2 each Leicester and {Suffolk rams}are carried.Lambs are sold in September/October at Aboyne. Winter 1984 was so severe that the cattle court roof caved in with no injury to cattle and a new one was built.The house was renovated in 1973. Balnahard was tenanted by{Harpers}for generations,followed by a{nephew,Bob {Low}and now his nephew and my Dad, {William Christie}who farms on his own, helped by us at hoeing and harvest.
